text:
Attune | Frontend Architect/Developer | New York, NY | Full time

Attune is a new joint venture between Two Sigma, AIG, and Hamilton Insurance Group, and is serving the particular needs of the $80-billion SME commercial insurance market in the United States.

Looking for frontend developer and architect roles to lead development of a new application with the ultimate goal streamlining risk submission and the insurance underwriting process for small businesses.

Great opportunity to be part of a well funded startup with great perks and huge potential in NYC.

https://www.attuneinsurance.com/careers - to apply http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20160928005770/en - for more information
